law.history: Repealed 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 31, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 187, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 18, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 57, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 36. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 14, effective June 16, 1960.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Hearing and notice on suspension, revocation, or refusal to issue license -- Judicial review.
